ComicInfo.Summary:
Hughie gets a glimpse of what married life is like and is not at all put off, but- being Hughie- he soon pushes his luck too far. Meanwhile, Butcher finds a Supe eager to please for once- but when all hell breaks loose at Yankee Stadium, he starts to smell a big fat rat...
